channel.title: Comments on: Day 48 – She Doesn’t Like Being Alone – Tuesday, May 23

item.title: By: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.dc:creator: Debbie Pollak (daughter of Sarah Pollak)
item.description: My dear Sue, It sounds like you are making great strides with your therapies. Hurray for you. Today was hard for me as I had what they call "a flair" due to the rheumatoid. One more day lost. I wish I could see you more often. I am looking ahead to see when I can venture out to you again. I am delighted that you want to have a party when you can cook again. I will be happy to assist you. I used to give lots of big parties, 60 to 100 guests. I did all the cooking myself. As a matter of fact you came to some of those parties I gave for Mom. She was so happy you came to see her. I will return the kindness by helping you with your party. You are important to me. Love, Debbie
item.content:encoded:
My dear Sue,
It sounds like you are making great strides with your therapies. Hurray for you. Today was hard for me as I had what they call “a flair” due to the rheumatoid. One more day lost.
I wish I could see you more often. I am looking ahead to see when I can venture out to you again.
I am delighted that you want to have a party when you can cook again. I will be happy to assist you. I used to give lots of big parties, 60 to 100 guests. I did all the cooking myself. As a matter of fact you came to some of those parties I gave for Mom. She was so happy you came to see her.
I will return the kindness by helping you with your party. You are important to me. Love, Debbie
